Yun Qing (Shirley) Huang 2nd Year Computer Science
Experience 2019 Summer
Intern at Chenghang Turbine Technology Co., Ltd
Shanghai, China
Personal Information
Phone (647)-569-9381
Email shirley.huang2000@outlook.com
GitHub https://github.com/ShirleyofHuang
Skills
Communication Skills
Full Stack Developer
UI/UX Design
Customer Service Representative Android Application Programming
Python ? Made a visual representation of a computer tree map
R ? Worked with Riipen to analyze user behaviours with huge data sets
React/JavaScript ? Used to create personal website portfolio
C++ ? Used with Qt to create a UI to control sensors for a turbine
Arduino ? Utilized for external hardware control with user command
Java ? Created fully functioning android app from scratch
Git ? Frequent use for version control
Languages
English ? Fluent French ? Fluent Mandarin ? Fluent
  - Worked with the team that designed the UI for sensors used in the turbine using Qt
- Doubled as representative for foreign workers
- Was an integral part of the communication between employees
2017-2018
Customer Representative at Plato?s Closet
- Efficient team member and competent team leader
- Worked well under pressure in a fast-paced environment
- Excellent communication skills
Education
2018-Present
University of Toronto
Calgary, AB
  - Bachelor of Science, Computer Science Specialist, Statistics Minor (3.65 cGPA)
Relevant Courses
- Software Design: Mainly practiced using SOLID principles to design projects in
Java
- Introduction to Theory

of Computation: Studied proof structures as well as
running time analysis
- Computer Organization: Learnt Assembly Language and dove deep into low level
coding
- Software Tools and Systems Programming: Learning to use software
techniques in Unix environment, using scripting language and C
- Data Structures and Analysis: Learning algorithm analysis as well as many other
abstract data structures.

Personal Projects
2020
StarterHacks ? Recipient of ?The Future of ATMs? award presented by RBC
- In a group of 5, we created a new software features to increase the speed and efficiency of withdrawing cash from ATMs
- Created a full stack program with Django and React that can read and generate QR codes 2019
2019
Personal Web Portfolio ? React
- Created a webpage from scratch using the React Library
- Explored Bootstrap as well as many other libraries
- Used proficiency in CSS and JavaScript to create components in solo project
2019
Android Game Application ? Java
- Worked in a small group of 6 members to create an android game
- Used SQLite to store and manage data
- Designed code structure as well as hierarchy of classes to increase efficiency
- Worked with front end as well as backend
2019
Pueblo Science Hackathon
- Joined a group of four to create a robotics kit for underprivileged communities in Guyana
- Used Arduino with C++ to synchronize sensors with an automated appliance Volunteering
2019-Present
Office Ops for CSSU (Computer Science Student Union)

- Give proper advice to Computer Science students
